June 15, 1907 D Dursley Contest
Dursley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
dursley-contest
None
A Musical Bouquet
Dursley, Gloucestershire, England, UK 1st prize £5. 2nd prize £3 and 3rd prize £2 divided between Stonehouse and Uley. Baritone medal: Arthur Burnett (Stonehouse) Cornet medal: A. Griffin (Dursley) Horn medal: Giles Whittard (Dursley) Euphonium medal: E. Whittard (Dursley). 8 bands competed.
March 21, 2012, 10:30 p.m. Sept. 18, 2018, 12:19 p.m.
1 Dursley Volunteers George Henry Wilson
2 Stonehouse Town Band [Gloucestershire] J. Cozens
2 Uley P.S.A H. Fussell
